content:
IDLDESC Struct

Definition

Contains information needed for transferring a structure element, parameter, or function return value between processes.

In this Article

public struct IDLDESC
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
IDLDESC

Remarks

For additional information about IDLDESC, see the MSDN Library.

The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. For more information, see How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions.

Fields

dwReserved

Reserved; set to null.

public IntPtr dwReserved;

Remarks

For additional information about IDLDESC, see the MSDN Library.

wIDLFlags

Indicates an IDLFLAG value describing the type.

public System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDLFLAG wIDLFlags;

Remarks

For additional information about IDLDESC, see the MSDN Library.
